critique: The document is an executive order focused on AI infrastructure. As the President, I want to convey a sense of confidence, security, and progress. I want to minimize fear and disgust. Sadness is not really relevant here. Initial scores: Joy: 7, Sadness: 1, Anger: 2, Fear: 3, Disgust: 2, Surprise: 5.
